name: dribdat
description: Dribdat is a platform for organizing hackathons and collaborative events. It lets organizers list projects, collect submissions, track team progress, and showcase results, all in a self-hosted, developer-friendly web application.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Allow participants to register teams and submit project ideas with descriptions and links

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Define hackathon themes, categories, and judging criteria for organized competition structure

features.title: Team Formation
features.description: Help participants find collaborators and join projects based on skills and interests

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Display all active projects on a public page for attendees and judges to browse and
